author: Dhruvraj Singh
comment: Question : I've seen a couple of times that the emails were not synced, missed out from folders. When I try to sync it forcefully, close full application remove from memory, it still does not come back. The emails are showing on my outlook at work but doesn't show in here. Is this known? It's not frequent, but it happens. Is there a solution in this case?

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
The issue will be fixed on the upcoming version.
Please check the issue when new version is updated.
Thank you for your patience.

author: Simon Watson
comment: Best e-mail App I have ever found, period. Bit surprised I had to buy a license for each device I own, never come across that before, but the fact I can colour code my calender entries, exactly as they are in Outlook on my desktop, makes this a winner for me. It walks all over the Outlook App.

author: Pasi Mustalahti
comment: The only email app, which can handle folders, collapse and expand them and collect the mails from server as is needed. Doesn't handle iCloud nor Gmail. The settings took some time, but after that OK. The price is a bit high. When in search window you can not mark messages for move to another folder (this is bad).

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
The actions are able to be used on the local search results only.
Please enable the "Local only" option and then click on the sender icon and you can select multiple items and then do actions.

author: Mohamed Ali
comment: Love this app. I use emails alot, so definitely worth the $10 for allowing me to do more on the go on my phone, which means less work when I get back to my laptop.     I do have one request: sync the calendar with Gmail. I use both work and Gmail calendars, and like to view them together. Currently only the google calendar app provides this capability. Thanks

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
To sync Google Calendar, Nine should supports CalDAV.
We will review to support CalDAV.
Thank you for your patience.

comment: Best features of an exchange client app which i was looking for but with one awful negative - painful slow sync with server on my GS8+ which is why you get only 3 stars.  I have followed the recommended fixes for this and even with battery optimization off it is still sloooow not worth the excess quick drain of the battery.  New emails notifications typically 20 minutes late arriving, not appropriate for messaging use where response time matters.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
We would like to review your logs for us to verify the details.
Please send us the logs with the following steps.
[Nine Settings - Send feedback - Report a problem]
We will give you an answer after analyzing the logs.

author: Bill Blandford
comment: I've tried many: Enhanced, Box, Mailwise, AOSP Email.  And Nine is way better.  Conversations view is good.  Out of office is great.  Tasks, notes syncs.  Suggested contacts toggle on or off.  Calendar sync all.  Everything is beautiful EXCEPT for the horrible drawer icon.  It's atrocious.      Edit:  love the new color in the latest update.  Icon is still ugly though.

author: Jeff Rowe
comment: I used Type Mail for years before I finally deleted it out of frustration. At one point, it had been the best, but this is vastly superior to Type mail, and every other email app I've tried. The UI is snappy and responsive; options are clear and easy to find; auto-discovery worked for ALL FIVE of my accounts (this left me speechless); and my activesync accounts work as expected. The app has an overall level of polish that is disappointingly rare on Android. Bravo!

author: Akhil Piplani
comment: Replies sent by me via Nine don't show up in the same thread on IBM Notes. This breaks the basics of email for me.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
1. We would like to review your logs for us to verify the details.
Please send us the logs with the following steps.
[Nine Settings - Send feedback - Report a problem]
We will give you an answer after analyzing the logs.
2. Please send us the screenshot of the email list including the broken conversations.

author: Dena Bauckman
comment: I was using Nine because it supports S/MIME but after a lot of troubleshooting I learned that it does not support split keys (one for signing and one for encrypting), which means I now have to use CipherMail. I was also very frustrated with the total lack of support available for Nine.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
You can install the certificates for signing and encrypting separately in the following settings.
[Nine settings - Your account - Security - Signed certificate / Encryption certificate]
If you still have the issue, please contact us at support@9folders.com.

author: Handy Pratama
comment: Best mail app ever. It could add your outlook account as exchange account. Having trouble sync my Outlook account in my phone calendar. Since Google calendar can't sync outlook calendar. This app save the day

author: Jon Spittle
comment: Downloaded this app mainly because I needed to have notifications from subfolders, all the apps I used before didn't have this option, therefore thank you for this app!  Edit : knocked off 2 stars for the recent issues, battery life poor since the app keeps requesting my password as it keeps asking to sync, not sure why but it's frustrating. Please fix. I've already sent the logs but not heard anything from developers. Update: The developer replied to my email and the issues now been resolved, thank you!

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
We gave you the answer via email.
Please check your email.

comment: Nine is the best mail app!  Can you please add a feature to search the body of an email? Sometimes I want to find a word or string in a long email I am reading but there is no search function there.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
We will review the suggestion with Nine team.
Thank you for your patience.

author: Richard Varga
comment: Far and away the best email app out there and Ive tried a ton - usually ending with me deleting them 10 minutes after setting it up. This is beautiful yet powerful and does a wonderful job letting you see emails in a clear conversational view thread. Have you ever seen the total disorganized mess that Yahoo and so many others do once an email thread has 5 or 6 dialogues in it?? Its almost impossible to even find the last contribution. Just awful. With Nine you will NOT have this problem. In conversation view, emails are succinctly presented in a clear layout almost like text bubbles. Support is great too. Everyone else just give up already. Nine has this

author: Taher Ba'Ba'
comment: Recently emails are getting sent delayed over data connection.. wireless is fine... Emails just stay in outbox.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
We would like to review your logs for us to verify the details.
Please send us the logs with the following steps.
[Nine Settings - Send feedback - Report a problem]
We will give you an answer after analyzing the logs.

author: Elias Kekakos
comment: I can't connect to an IMAP email account through the internet while I can connect to the same email account from BlueMail. The worst thing is that it doesn't say why.

author: Mohammad Saif Mulla
comment: My work email has been set for two step verification and since then nine hasn't been able to connect.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
If the account is an Office 365 account, please select the 'Office 365' option when setting up the account.
If not, please try using the App password.

author: ANDRIA CLARK
comment: Great app! I really love using it. I just had sweitch phones. Do I need to purchase this again?

author: Dimitris Vasilopoulos
comment: Above that Nine client is fully support exchange server 2016 among other email services the 9Folders support team is responding within a day to email requests. Well done guys...!!!

author: Paul Farquhar
comment: This is the best email app I have found. Beats Gmail by far. The support is really good too with fast response. I can clearly recommend nine!

author: Alun James
comment: Looks fantastic and have set up 365 on work phone but won't connect to gmail servers at moment...  Sorted, great app.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
Please select Gmail option when setting up your Gmail account.
If it is not working, please send us Nine log file.
[Nine Settings - Send feedback - Report a problem]
We will give you an answer after analyzing the logs.

author: Christopher Guardado
comment: Great email app. Best app for MIME P7m encrypted messages. Opened the P7m message like a regular email. Fast and easy. Easy setup of emails

author: Alessandro Cesarini
comment: Great mail App but very poorly integrated with MFA - very disappointed to add my credentials and MFA 3-4 times a day

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
We would like to review your logs for us to verify the details.
Please send us the logs with the following steps.
[Nine Settings - Send feedback - Report a problem]
We will give you an answer after analyzing the logs.

author: Miguel Angel Rojas
comment: This app is much better at handling Office 365 than outlook itself. Love the interface and the way email threads show.

author: Dustin Janis
comment: Best email app to work with O365 I have found. Tasks, categories and everything syncs perfectly

author: Hafiz Rahman
comment: The best email client I have used and plus the customer service response is very impressive.

author: Pravin Nikam
comment: Cannot add outlook 365 account

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
We would like to review your logs for us to verify the details.
If you fail to set up your account, you can send logs.
Please send us the logs with the following steps.
[Troubleshooting - Report a problem]
We will give you an answer after analyzing the logs.

author: Pratyush Nalam
comment: This is glorious. Far better than how Android handles Exchange.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
IMAP will be supported soon.
Please wait a little more.
Thank you for your understanding.

author: Eric Gruber
comment: Worked great to get outlook calendar only.

author: Bilal Mosaad
comment: Excellent work - Great App

author: Mauricio Alas
comment: Updated back to 5 stars.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
We are sorry about causing inconvenience in using Nine. 
We can't find your issue with your name in our issue list.
If you fail to set up your account, you can send logs.
Please send us the logs.
[Troubleshooting - Report a problem]
When sending the log file, please include this comments and we can know that it is a your issue.

author: Bagus Danarto
comment: Convenient and orginized

author: Christopher Boss
comment: Wish there was a way to change your protocol from ActiveSync to EWS or something. Can't access my work email otherwise.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
Sorry, we do not have a plan to support EWS at this time.
We will review it later.
Thank you for your understanding.

author: Sam McCarthy
comment: Update: my Android Wear problems were completely my fault... Changing to 5 stars

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
Can you check whether you can get the Nine notification on your Wear device?
If possible please contact us at support@9folders.com and we will follow up the issue via email.

author: Joseph DiFrancesco
comment: Microsoft should buy this app and ditch Outlook.

author: Mark Schmidt
comment: I have been using Nine for 5 days now and so far I absolutely LOVE it. It is well thought out and is the first email client that can accommodate my wide variety of email platforms including Microsoft OWA. The rich text capability is wonderful - both for emails and signatures. While these are definitely not showstoppers for me, there are just a couple enhancements I'd love to see: 1) The ability to add folders when filing an email. It is a bit cumbersome to leave the filing dialogue, go to settings, add your folder, then reinitiate the filing of the email you want to store in the new folder. 2) The ability to see total number of items in the currently selected folder (not just unread items). 3) The ability to open a folder and at that time, have the option to sync it (rather than having to go to settings to select the synced folders).  Outside of these enhancements, I am really loving my new found ability to see all four of my email accounts in one client!

author: KB C
comment: Alot of useless junk. No way to synchronize all folders at once or set to open in all folder view. Many folders show "no mail" although set to download all mail and synchronized several times. No folder notifications. It even screwed up my sub-folder order. The stock Samsung email app has more useful features! Uninstalled

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
We would like to review your logs for us to verify the details.
Please send us the logs with the following steps.
[Nine Settings - Send feedback - Report a problem]
We will give you an answer after analyzing the logs.

author: Don Guber
comment: Had an issue with my email,  wasn't the apps fault and I deleted the app along with the access code. Contacted customer service and they resent. Great customer service and email app I have found and I tried many.

author: Matt Hoenicke
comment: Nearly perfect -- would love to see options for the following: Message list content, change from 1 to 3 lines of preview text - Floating action button color change, separate from any other color change options - Option to change the font.

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content: Please send the suggestions to support@9folders.com.

author: Phil Jackson
comment: First email app that was able to work with my org's exchange account on my Chromebook- unfortunately once I sent an email the body of every email I sent came up as blank. Refund requested, which is a shame because it is a good looking app

reply.author: 9Folders Inc.
reply.content:
We would like to review your logs for us to verify the details.
Please send us the logs with the following steps.
[Nine Settings - Send feedback - Report a problem]
We will give you an answer after analyzing the logs.

author: Matthew Weber
comment: Best in Android. The only thing I'd change is allowing the app to check Gmail more frequently than every five minutes.
